name: Bullet Sudoku (Demo)
description:
Bullet Sudoku is a retro-inspired 2D top-down puzzle platformer roguelike, in which you navigate a procedurally generated sudoku-shaped dungeon of 81 rooms in 9 difficulties.

Clear rooms by weaving through tons of bullets, collecting gems and buying power-ups in the shop.

Originally, this was meant to become a "proper" bullet hell, but the synchronized bullet patterns revealed some interesting and fun puzzle aspects, so I rolled with it :D

A full release on itch.io and Steam is planned for late this year!

Join the PyPlatformer discord to discuss BulletSudoku and gamedev in Python:

https://discord.gg/PWx7PEP3

Features:

  • 31 levels
  • 9 shop items
  • 3 difficulty modes
  • 1 extra mode
  • 1 original OST

Minimum system requirements:

  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • RAM: 1 GB
  • Disk: 100 MB free storage

(If you don't manage to run the game with this hardware, please let me know).

A release on Linux and MacOS might come later, depending on community interest.

Listen to the full OST on my music channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBB1v2nSWPvX_9Km-AMGkGQ
